actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for comprehensive and quality health care for persons with communicative disorders under the health insurance program (medicare) including preventive, diagnostic, treatment, and rehabilitative functions.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to provide that loans shall be made to small business concerns in order to facilitate the conversion to the metric system of measurement.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for comprehensive and quality health care for persons with communicative disorders under the health insurance program (medicare) including preventive, diagnostic, treatment, and rehabilitative functions.
